com.alvermont.terraj.planet.project
Class HeightfieldGenerator

java.lang.Object
  com.alvermont.terraj.planet.PlanetGen
      com.alvermont.terraj.planet.project.AbstractProjector
          com.alvermont.terraj.planet.project.HeightfieldGenerator

public class HeightfieldGenerator
extends AbstractProjector

This class doesn't implemenent the Projector interface as it doesn't generate an image, instead it retains the raw height values.
